headline: Hidden Ways to Maximize Your Tax Refund and Find Lesser-Known Deductions and Credits
summary: MOUNTAIN VIEW, Calif., April 02, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- With the IRS tax filing deadline approaching on April 15, experts say you should file now. You can boost your refund with so many deductions and credits. A surprising number of people are unaware that the tax filing deadline is quickly approaching on April 15th. headline: Intuit: Steady Performance, But This Tax Leader Already Commands A High Price (Upgrade)
summary: Intuit faces heavy competition in non-tax business software, with rivals like Workday, Oracle NetSuite, and SAP posing significant challenges. Learn more on INTU stock here.

headline: Key takeaways from Citi's U.S. consumer tax survey
summary: Investing.com -- Intuit 's (NASDAQ:INTU) TurboTax continues to dominate the U.S. tax software market with a stable 60% share, Citi’s 2025 consumer tax survey revealed Wednesday.

headline: New Intuit Small Business Growth Council Launched to Champion AI and Digital Transformation for Small Businesses in the UK
summary: LONDON, April 02, 2025--Intuit Inc. (Nasdaq: INTU), the global financial technology platform that makes TurboTax, Credit Karma, QuickBooks, and Mailchimp, today announced the launch of the Intuit Small Business Growth Council (Council), a new initiative dedicated to empowering small businesses in the UK through AI and digital adoption.
